title: So uhhhh....I was called a terrorist by my team mates...
body: I wish I was kidding and i'm not sure what even prompted it in the first place but all of a sudden the gnar on our team just started to go on and on about how I was someone who was a part of islam and saying how I was this scum of the earth goat loving bombing crazy man...Has the community gone even crazier than before because thi sis even new to me

replies.body: Sounds like pretty standard internet trolling. I've heard much more offensive things. Terrorist? Pshhh okay.
/mute all at the start of every game :) and if that person was that bad, I hope you reported them, Riot has a 0 tolerance policy towards that kind of talk.

You think that's bad? Try having people saying they're pissed off because of your name.
If racism exists in real life, it will naturally exist in online games, even more since the guy can be racist while hiding in their basement.  Just give them the "muted ;)" treatment like you would with toxic, salty, flaming,  etc. people.

Sucks that you're facing such ridiculous crap from people in the game.

Mute and report them. There isn't much else you can do. Let Riot handle them.
Just mute? Not sure what else to say
